name: MimiChan V2.1
description:
18/5/2023 - Update

V2.1 Update dataset and caption

Follow my work on: https://linktr.ee/NovaAIArt

This LoRA can work well with ChillOutMix and NeverEndingDream (because I already test)

Steps: 30

Sampler: Euler a

CFG scale: 8

Normal using at 1 but 0.8 is good enough

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, 1girl, (colorful),(finely detailed beautiful eyes and detailed face),cinematic lighting,bust shot,extremely detailed CG unity 8k wallpaper,white hair,solo,smile,intricate skirt,((flying petal)),(Flowery meadow) sky, cloudy_sky, building, moonlight, moon, night, (dark theme:1.3), light, fantasy
meta.negativePrompt: sketch, duplicate, ugly, huge eyes, text, logo, monochrome, worst face, (bad and mutated hands:1.3), (worst quality:2.0), (low quality:2.0), (blurry:2.0), horror, geometry, bad_prompt_version2, (bad hands), (missing fingers), multiple limbs, bad anatomy, (interlocked fingers:1.2), Ugly Fingers, (extra digit and hands and fingers and legs and arms:1.4), ((2girl)), (deformed fingers:1.2), (long fingers:1.2),(bad-artist-anime), bad-artist, bad hand, extra legs

meta.prompt: fashi-girl, masterpiece, (best quality:1.4), best illustration, HDR, (beautiful details:1.2), intricate details, detailed scenery, dramatic light, best shadow, 1girl, <lora:MimiChanV2.1:0.8>, 18 year old, medium breast, wearing ultra detailed hanfu, detailed skin texture, hair ornament, colorful
